title: Test Post
content:
So, I've created a blog.

Blogging hasn't ever really been a dream of mine, but something about the environment it creates is exciting to me; the fact that everything I write is publicised adds an element of caution combined with mindfulness that I can't get from journaling. I mean, think of a journal - it's private, locked away from the world, free of judgement, and reserved in nature. The act of making something public induces feelings that yell, "it better be something I'm at least somewhat proud of sharing."
